description:
while running install_venv.py on Fedora 16, the step that attempts to patch 
eventlet/green/subprocess.py
fails because python2.6 is hard coded into the path to 
.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/green/subprocess.py

mine is here
.nova-venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/eventlet/green/subprocess.py

introduced by the fix for this bug 
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/884915

Using current git checkout
title: install_venv.py Fails while patching subprocess.py

comments.content:
while running install_venv.py on Fedora 16, the step that attempts to patch 
eventlet/green/subprocess.py
fails because python2.6 is hard coded into the path to 
.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/green/subprocess.py

mine is here
.nova-venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/eventlet/green/subprocess.py

introduced by the fix for this bug 
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/884915

Using current git checkout
